article.title: New inclination changing eclipsing binaries in the Magellanic Clouds

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the yellow area in the left panel of Figure 1 represent?
choices: Region with an abundance of triple star systems.
Region with an absence of triple star systems.
Region where the inner binary period (P1) is unstable.
Region where the third companion period (P2) is unstable.

multiple_choice_question.text: Which line represents the empirical stability criterion for triple star systems, based on observations?
What does the parameter 's' represent in Formula (1), concerning the stability of coplanar hierarchical triple systems?
choices: Exponent in the stability criterion equation
Total mass of the triple system

multiple_choice_question.text: What does an arrow with an upper limit represent in Figure 7?
choices: An eclipsing binary with a precisely determined third body orbital period.
A triple star system with a lower limit on the third body orbital period.
A triple star system with an upper limit on the third body orbital period.
A system excluded from the analysis due to insufficient data.
